title.canSelectBaan: Do you want to participate in Freshers' Fair grouping activity?

uploadModal.title: Edit Image
uploadModal.desc: Use a photo that clearly sees your face. | Do not apply image filter. | Maximum file size is 4 MB.

vaccineModal.title: Upload QR Code
vaccineModal.desc: Use QR Code from Digital Health Pass category in Mor Prompt (หมอพร้อม) app. | Select EU Digital COVID Certificate. | Select type as Vaccination Status. | Maximum file size is 4 MB.

error.invalidMime: The image must be in PNG or JPEG format.

error.vaccineAlreadyApproved: This QR has already been used.
